short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The internet's conversation layer, powered by web3 // Chat real time with people on the same site as you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The internet's conversation layer, powered by web3.

Find Your Tribe 🙆🏾‍♀️🙆🏻‍♂️🙋🏿‍♂️🙆‍♀️🙋🏾‍♂️🙋🏿‍♀️

Bonfires enables you to connect with people on the same web page that you're on, building community around the things that matter most to you.

You Are What You Surf  💻🌍

With over 1 billion websites (and counting), the internet is vast.  And, in many ways, the web pages we visit as we navigate the internet define who we are.  Spend time on recipe websites 🥘🥧🍲 do you?  Or do you maybe bounce around sports ⚽️🏈🏀⚾️ sites?  NEWS FLASH: You are not alone!  At any given moment, hundreds (or hundreds of thousands) of like-minded people are viewing the exact same page that you are.  Bonfires enables you to connect with them and chat about wherever your passions have taken you.

Building Community Around Content  💃🏾🕺🏾 

Talk directly with people who are reading the same article, looking at the same social profile, watching the same TV show, listening to the same music, etc. as you.  Wherever your internet exploration takes you, the Bonfires app is right there with you. Come join the global conversation taking place about the things that matter most to you.

Token-Gated Access  🔐🖼

We ❤️ NFTs!!!  Our primary means of adding new users is by adding NFT collections to our allow list.  Any holder of an NFT in that collection will automatically be allowed in.  Wanna join the fun?  Submit your favorite NFT collection here: https://forms.gle/n2YNU2cMbEwu5dZ68.  We especially love inclusive NFT communities! 🌈✊🏾❤️

Note: Bonfires is currently in early-alpha release.  It is ugly and has all sorts of bugs (...bugly?). 🐞🐛🐜  Really, it's more of a *dys*functional prototype than anything else.  We are desperate for your feedback to help make it awesome!  👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
